title: The Westport Independent (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_the_westport_independent_2.0.0.4.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
Credits: this release was made possible by Swapware!

Title: THE WESTPORT INDEPENDENT
Genre: Simulation - Point-and-click - Modern
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player
Released: January 21, 2016
Size: 52.2 MB
Company: Double Zero One Zero / Coffee Stain Studios
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/westport_independent_the

About:
The Westport Independent is a censorship simulator taking place in a post-war country, governed by the recently elected Loyalist Party. As the Editor of one of the last independent newspapers in the country, your job is to remove and edit the content of your paper, affecting the people's opinion from both the rebels and the Loyalist government. With an increase of rebel activity and an ever watching government breathing down your neck, whose trust will you print?
Change the content and meaning of your articles by censoring them to your liking. While you canâ€™t lie, you donâ€™t have to tell the whole truth either.
Employees with fleshed out character, who will not only react to your actions, but also discuss them with other colleagues.
Receive letters and messages from public figures, rebel leaders, employees and other characters affected by your actions.
Adaptive stories where your actions affect the opinions of the people, which affects what happens in the city, which in turn affects the stories you receive.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: Open GL 2.0 Compatible Graphics Card
Hard Drive: 500 MB HDD
Mouse, Keyboard
